name: giga boy
description:
Made in like two days for GBTK jam ♾ (https://itch.io/jam/game-breakers-toolkit-jam-8)

Based on every single judging criteria for the jam

If you want 30+ minutes of pure gaming despair then this is for you

I wonder if you can get past the "tutorial"

Credits to Twinseer for both voice acting and taking the budget for an enemy
https://twitter.com/All_Voyant
